posts.post_content:
I want to buy your completely hammered, stained, glued, missing paper, torn, broken down and tired T206's for my collection. I am paying $7 each for them. Please PM.

Craig M.

Thanks Tony (T206fix) for the great deal. You are the best!

I'm still looking for any and all completely hammered T206's in that $7 - $8 range.

I would like to also thank Net54 for making a perfect venue to buy/sell/trade for this old stuff. I have gained many new collecting friends because of this site.

Craig M.

Thankyou Michael Peich for a great deal.

WOW two hammered transactions in one day; keep 'email coming!

Craig M.
